sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) The character may voluntarily increase the difficulty of a combat check by one to deal a crippling blow. If he succeeds and deals damage to the target's wound threshold, the target suffers 1 strain whenever he moves for the remainder of the encounter.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Crippling blow</name> <number>TAL0001024</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 16:56:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c2f9426cdb660c542901de90cf961901</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 16:56:41</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
